__e: Think of the Japanese soldiers who hid for years in the jungle after WW II was over. They didn't surrender until 1967.
Can you confirm where you were when you found out World War ll was over?
You've told me your entire story, stretching back through the ages, but when I first knew you, it was after World War I, and your names were Joe and Edith.
You ever think, Ed, since the Second World War, it's been 60 years, and still no WW3.
We kicked your ass in World War II and we can do it again.
